title: SLURRY COMPOSITIONS FOR USE IN A CHEMICAL-MECHANICAL PLANARIZATION PROCESS

samples.experiment_context: Ultrafine calcined kaolin abrasive prepared from Ansilex 9348 calcined kaolin slurry. Processed by additive mixing (Defloc 411), Netzsch milling (zirconia beads, 1.2 gpm, 2 passes), further additive, spray drying, reslurrying (Waring Blender, 5 min), and desliming (CU5000 centrifuge, 40% solids feed, 26 min wide open). SEM shown in FIG. 12 of patent.

synthesis_conditions.other_details: Initial mixing with Defloc 411 (4 pounds per ton). Netzsch milled (1.2 gallons per minute, 2 passes) using zirconia beads. After milling, Defloc 411 (2 pounds per ton) added. Spray dried. Reslurried in Waring Blender for 5 minutes.

washing.details: 40% solids feed, 26 minutes wide open, to obtain ultrafine fraction.

particle_size_distribution.details: For ultrafine product: 100% < 1µm, 99% < 0.5µm, 98% < 0.3µm, 85% < 0.2µm. General patent text suggests average 0.01-0.5µm for kaolin.

samples.experiment_context: CMP slurry formulated with ultrafine calcined kaolin (from PatentEx1_Ultrafine_Calcined_Kaolin_Abrasive) at 4% solids. Chemical package: hydrogen peroxide, benzotriazole, citric acid, TEA, TX-100. Tested on 200mm Si wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier). Performance (Table 3): Erosion <1 nm (100µm pitch, 50% density), Good Cu/Ta selectivity. Cu MRR ~25 nm/min (from FIG. 13).

slurry_preparation.other_details: Slurry passed through Puradisc 25 GD glass filter (2 microns pore size).

material_removal_rate.details: Material: Copper. Estimated from FIG. 13 (approx. 250 Å/min).

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200 mm Si wafers with copper interconnects and Ta diffusion barrier (dual-damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Commercial alumina-based CMP slurry (Cabot Microelectronics) as comparative. Tested on 200mm Si wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier). Performance (Table 3): Erosion and Dishing - severe overpolishing (100µm pitch, 50% density), Very low Cu/Ta selectivity. Cu MRR ~70 nm/min (from FIG. 13).

material_removal_rate.details: Material: Copper. Estimated from FIG. 13 (approx. 700 Å/min).

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200 mm Si wafers with copper interconnects and Ta diffusion barrier (dual-damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample A) prepared from Engelhard spray dried product. Reslurried (Waring Blender, 5 min, 40% solids), deslimed (CU5000 centrifuge, 40% solids, 15 min wide open). Supernatant (5% solids) filtered (Whatman filter, 2µm). SEM in FIG. 14 of patent.

synthesis_conditions.other_details: Reslurried in Waring Blender for 5 minutes to 40% solids.

washing.details: 40% solids feed, 15 minutes wide open. Supernatant at 5% solids was the product.

post_synthesis_treatment.filtration: Filtered through Whatman filter (25 mm diameter, 2 µm pore size).

samples.experiment_context: Ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample B) prepared from a different starting feed PSD material. Deslimed (CU5000, 40% solids, 15 min), then ultrafines subjected to additional 32 min desliming (2400 rpm). Filtered (Whatman filter, 2µm).
samples.precursor_chemical: Hydrous kaolin spray dried product (different starting feed PSD material)

synthesis_conditions.other_details: Reslurried (assumed, similar to Sample A) to 40% solids.

washing.details: Initial 15 min desliming, then ultrafines subjected to additional 32 min desliming.

post_synthesis_treatment.filtration: Filtered through Whatman filter (25 mm diameter, 2 µm pore size).

samples.experiment_context: CMP test using ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample A from Ex3). Chemical package from Ex2 (H2O2, BTA, citric acid, TEA, TX-100). Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 254 nm/min, WIWNU: 4.7%, Cu/Ta Selectivity: 65, Ta/TEOS Selectivity: 5.9. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 110 nm, Erosion: 20 nm. (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 125 nm, Erosion: 20 nm.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_details: Ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample A from Ex3)

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Comparative CMP test using fumed silica (Aerosil 200). Chemical package from Ex2. Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 206 nm/min, WIWNU: 4.9%, Cu/Ta Selectivity: 40, Ta/TEOS Selectivity: 1.4. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 120 nm, Erosion: 100 nm. (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 130 nm, Erosion: 110 nm.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_details: Fumed silica (Aerosil 200, Degussa, primary particle size 12 nm, avg aggregate 170 nm by Microtrac)

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Comparative CMP test using alpha alumina (Polishing Solutions Inc.). Chemical package from Ex2. Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 713 nm/min, WIWNU: 10.2%, Cu/Ta Selectivity: 17, Ta/TEOS Selectivity: 2.8. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 110 nm, Erosion: 150 nm. (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 120 nm, Erosion: 160 nm.

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).

samples.experiment_context: CMP test using ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample B from Ex3). Modified chemical package (Ex2 package minus TX100 and TEA, pH lowered from 5 to 4). Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 173 nm/min, WIWNU: 1%, Cu/TEOS Selectivity: 1020. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 405 nm (150µm line), Erosion: 25 nm (70% density). (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 510 nm, Erosion: 32 nm.

slurry_preparation.abrasive_details: Ultrafine hydrous kaolin (Sample B from Ex3)

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Comparative CMP test using fumed silica (Aerosil 200 from Ex4). Modified chemical package (Ex2 package minus TX100 and TEA, pH lowered from 5 to 4). Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 224 nm/min, WIWNU: 1%, Cu/TEOS Selectivity: 83. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 503 nm (150µm line), Erosion: 223 nm (70% density). (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 466 nm, Erosion: 247 nm.

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).

samples.experiment_context: Comparative CMP test using commercial alumina-based slurry (CCMP from Cabot Microelectronics). Modified chemical package context (pH 4, no TX100/TEA assumed for comparison basis, though CCMP is commercial). Tested on bare TEOS, Cu, Ta wafers, and patterned wafers. Blanket Cu MRR: 127 nm/min, WIWNU: 17%, Cu/TEOS Selectivity: 52. Patterned wafer (just polished) Dishing: 131 nm (150µm line), Erosion: 45 nm (70% density). (Overpolished 20% extra time) Dishing: 133 nm, Erosion: 70 nm.

slurry_preparation.target_final_slurry_ph: 4 (for comparative context, actual CCMP pH may vary)

cmp_performance.substrate_details: 200mm TEOS, Cu, Ta blanket wafers; 200mm Si patterned wafers (Cu interconnects, Ta barrier, dual damascene).
